Text:
Thanks Blackcanary! I love the re-scans of old comics that Novus is doing lately... 

I found a tiny problem... The c2c and noads versions of The Maxx #09 in this torrent are the same. Both are the the noads version even though one is labelled as c2c. Looks like the Novus group made a labelling error...

Thanks for the catch Ogurek4.  The mistake was on my part when I got The Maxx #9 last month.  Here is the correct c2c version of The Maxx #9:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7911472/The_Maxx_09_(1994)_(c2c__amp_amp__noAds)_(Mediozo-Novus)_[BNVS-D]
